name: Crypto Checkout for Woocommerce
author: Cryptocheckout.co

sections.description:
Secure Simple Decentralized crypto payments gateway.
This plugin is relying on a 3rd party CryptoCheckout (crypto payment processor) as a service

    Features:

  • Start in seconds: use your private crypto addresses, generate merchant ID in one click/tap, no signup required, no ID verification required
  • Universal: target any client who has crypto wallet not only clients on such platform
  • Decentralized: no private keys/mnemonic phrases required/shared with us
  • Sales notifications: includes amount, currency & payer address
  • Setup isolated prices: if you don’t need to follow the market prices, so no need to update the prices of all the products

Crypto currencies supported are: USDT(BEP20), BTC, ETH, SOL, AVAX, ADA, DOT, XTZ, XMR.
Languages supported: ar, bn, zh, cs, en, da, nl, fr, de, he, hi, id, it, ja, ko, pl, pt, ru, sv, es, tr, uk, vi (ISO 639‑1).

    Fees: there are two plans (unique flat fee), there are no fee per transaction/sale:

  • Free: 0.00$ 5 transactions/month
  • Paid: 2.00$ Unlimited transactions/month

Live preview: https://myawesome.shop/wp/checkout
Important: This version works only with latest WooCommerce releases (blocks checkout).
CryptoCheckout homepage: https://cryptocheckout.co
How it’s secure: https://cryptocheckout.co/how-it’s-secure
Terms: https://cryptocheckout.co/terms
Privacy Policy: https://cryptocheckout.co/privacy-policy
Changelog: https://cryptocheckout.co/changelog
Any issues contact: support@cryptocheckout.co
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

You will need to create/generate new wallet from our site (you will get addresses, mnemonic phrase & ID)
Paste your id in the ID input form inside the woocommerce get payed crypto payment settings, the payment button will add automatically after enable the gateway/payment method, the prices will set depending to you: market price or isolated
Manage your wallet by paste the mnemonic phrase on trust wallet or any other wallet

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 (2023-06-02)

  • Plugin released.

1.0.1 (2023-06-19)

  • Fix stuck/block/ when activating without Woocommerce is activated
  • Update plugin options, prices menu drop down instead checkbox

1.0.3 (2023-09-07)

  • Fix admin notices
  • Add default values of language (en) & prices (market)

1.0.5 (2023-10-14)

  • Enhance transaction validation, the issue before the fix is the rate may change at the moment of validating the transaction that cause failing, but now we’ve attache the rate at the moment when the user pay to the transaction object, so the problem goes away

1.0.6 (2024-01-10)

  • Update links after moving from getpaidcrypto.online to cryptocheckout.co

1.0.7 (2024-01-11)

  • Update the code to comply with php8.3

1.0.9 (2024-01-29)

  • Add WooCommerce blocks checkout support

1.1.0 (2024-01-30)

  • Add USDT Binance Smart Chain support

1.1.1 (2024-01-30)

  • Fixes & enhacements

1. Crypto checkout as a payment method.

  2. Pay Now button.

  3. Selecting the desired currency.

  4. Collecting the user address, it's used for confirmation process (We ignore other/side confirmations from other locations comes from hackers that listen to the merchant address).

  5. QR & the merchant address.

  6. Copy address clicked.

  7. Validating transaction using crypto explorers.

  8. Admin dashboard (listed on the woo's payment methods).

  9. Admin dashboard (options main page).

  10. Admin dashboard (suite of options).

  11. Admin dashboard (market prices).

  12. Admin dashboard (isolated prices).

  13. Admin dashboard (isolated prices, setup values).

  14. Admin dashboard (isolated prices, setup values).

  15. Admin dashboard (isolated prices, setup values).
